sentences.english: Ganymede tried to recollect that it was a man's duty to comfort and console a woman, the weaker vessel.

sentences.english: It took some convincing, but I did manage to get a few of the girls to pick up the bills--finally.
sentences.chinese: 经过一番劝解，最终我成功地让几个女孩拿起了钞票。

sentences.english: Pilate therefore, willing to release Jesus, spake again to them.
sentences.chinese: 彼拉多愿意释放耶稣，就又劝解他们。

sentences.english: "Don't let that keep you at home, " urged the Brass Pot.
sentences.chinese: “不要让这些把你困在家里，”铜罐劝解到。
他的劝解打消了我的疑虑。

sentences.english: Shortly afterwards, four more policemen were arrived and persuaded the workers.
sentences.chinese: 不久之后，另外四个警察到了并对工人进行劝解。

sentences.english: For many births you tried to propitiate Me through austerities.
sentences.chinese: 你的很多世都设法通过苦行来劝解我。

sentences.english: Zhao Fu privately appealed to zhao mother, also cannot too spoiled child.

sentences.english: A Somali man tries to comfort his son, who aches to go outside and play.

sentences.english: In infants because of the emergence and Explained, he was to re-emerge.
sentences.chinese: 就因为依儿的出现和劝解，他才重新振作起来。

sentences.english: Beacause we accepted the same education and preach.
sentences.chinese: 因为我们接受的教育和劝解大同小异。

sentences.english: After her comrades had talked with her several times, she became a bit more cheerful.
sentences.chinese: 经大家多次劝解，她的情绪才好了一些。

sentences.english: Shortly afterwards , four more policemen arrived and demonstrated with the workmen.
